title: Day 13 - Learned about Blender and Cryptocurrency
content:
• Today I started making an animated lamp as instructed in the course, and during this process, I learned various concepts and nuances of Blender.
  • Today I watched the fourth episode of Cryptocurrency Investing Masterclass. It talks about the importance of investment strategies when dealing with cryptocurrency. I also learned about P2P and USDT and how a crypto exchange works.
author: Aarush Popli
metadesc: Today I started making an animated lamp as instructed in the course, and during this process, I learned various concepts and nuances of Blender. ...
